DENY UPDATE ON t_order TO user_dev CASCADEK
DENY ALL PRIVILEGES ON t_order TO user_dev
DENY INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON t_order TO user_dev
DENY SELECT ON t_order TO user_dev

DROP USER user_dev@localhost

DROP ROLE default_role
DROP LOGIN login1
RENAME USER 'user_dev'@'localhost' TO 'user_dev'@'127.0.0.1'
GRANT select, update, insert, delete on t_order to user_dev
GRANT select, update, insert, delete on t_order to user_dev with GRANT option

GRANT ADVISOR, ALTER DATABASE to user_dev with admin option

GRANT select, update ON t_order TO 'user_dev'@'localhost'
REVOKE select, update on t_order from user_dev
REVOKE role_dev from user_dev

REVOKE SELECT ON *.* FROM user_dev

REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type1, type2 FROM role_dev

SET ROLE ALL EXCEPT role_dev
